item.title: Install R and RStudio
item.description: For this course, we will be using the free and open-source program R, along a user interface called RStudio. R works on pretty much every platform available, including the widely available Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux systems.

item.title: Workshops
item.description: SLASS - Section c The Sri Lanka Association for the Advancement of Science (SLAAS), the premier scientific body in the country was founded in 1944 and incorporated by Act of Parliament No 11 of 1966.
